snippet: President Obama nominated Beth Cobert to lead the Office of Personnel Management, which attracted scrutiny after an attack on its computer systems affected millions.
abstract: Pres Barack Obama nominates Beth Cobert to lead Office of Personnel Management; Cobert has been acting director of agency following resignation of previous director, Katherine Archuleta, amid data breach scandal; nomination requires Senate approval.
lead_paragraph: President Obama nominated Beth Cobert to lead the Office of Personnel Management, which attracted scrutiny after an attack on its computer systems affected millions.

headline.main: Acting Director Chosen to Head Agency That Suffered Data Breach
headline.print_headline: Acting Director Chosen to Head Agency That Suffered Data Breach
